titles: Of the mensuration of running waters an excellent piece written in Italian by Don Benedetto Castelli ... ; Englished from the third and best edition ; with the addition of a second book not before extant / by Thomas Salusbury.
author: Castelli, Benedetto, 1577 or 8-1643.
Salusbury, Thomas. Mathematical collections.
notes: Added t.p. on p. [35]: Geometrical demonstrations of the measure of running waters.
Also appears in the 2d tome, 2d pt. of Salusbury's Mathematical collections, ... 1661.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Reclamation of land --  Early works to 1800.
